metadata.title: Rubie's Inflatable Inflatable Hippo Adult Sized Costumes, As Shown, One Size US
features: LONG SLEEVE grey inflatable jumpsuit with battery operated fan; attached pink-glitter tutu skirt
Inflates using motor powered by 4 AA batteries, pouch carries motor, suit zips in the back
Standard fits a 42 to 44-inch jacket size and 34 to 36-inch waist
GROUPS / FAMILIES: Combine with other Fun-Flatable costumes by Rubie's for an inflated fun time
Witches to wenches to vampires to vagrants, from Graceland to galaxies far, far away, Rubie's is sure to offer fancy dress and decorative items to inspire and entertain any time of year
description: Disguise yourself as a Hippo-ballerina in this fun inflatable costume! Long sleeve grey jumpsuit with attached hippopotamus hood, see through panel for visibility during wear; attached pink-glitter tutu skirt and pink accent on foot covers. Try to be as light on your feet as possible while performing a dance recital in this fun costume. One size. Standard, designed to fit most adults and older teens. Please read before buying: costumes are not sized the same as apparel; please consult the Rubie's Male size chart in images, read recent reviews and Q A for best fit. Inflatable design with battery operated fan; fan requires 4 AA batteries, fan instructions included with costume. Batteries available separately. Great for the whole year; inflatable fun runs, parades, school events, themed parties, comic con, cosplay and of course Trick or Treat and Halloween too! Pair with other "FUN-FLATABLE" costumes by Rubie's for inflated fun time! Fun-Flatables, Rubie's line of inflatable costumes, takes standard costumes and blows them up to the next level. Lightweight tent-like material is expertly "sculpted" with detailed and intricate patterns. Discover fresh takes on classic characters and fun new innovative designs in licensed and non-licensed costumes, accessories and decor! Family-focused and based in New York since 1951. As the world's largest designer and manufacturer of costumes Rubie's brings fun and fantasy to dress-up. Rubie's promotes safety in dress-up, so you can relax and have a great time while looking the part. Look to Rubie's for every costume occasion and season!
